functions.name: max_mem32_pages
functions.logic: Returns the maximum number of pages for 32-bit WebAssembly memory.  This value may be influenced by command-line flags.

functions.name: max_mem64_pages
functions.logic: Returns the maximum number of pages for 64-bit WebAssembly memory.  This value may be influenced by command-line flags.

functions.name: max_mem32_bytes
functions.logic: Calculates and returns the maximum size (in bytes) of a 32-bit WebAssembly memory by multiplying the maximum number of pages by the page size (kWasmPageSize).

functions.name: max_mem64_bytes
functions.logic: Calculates and returns the maximum size (in bytes) of a 64-bit WebAssembly memory by multiplying the maximum number of pages by the page size (kWasmPageSize).

functions.name: max_table_size
functions.logic: Returns the maximum size allowed for a WebAssembly table. This value is influenced by command-line flags.

functions.name: max_table_init_entries
functions.logic: Returns the maximum number of initial entries allowed in a WebAssembly table. This value is influenced by command-line flags.

functions.name: max_module_size
functions.logic: Returns the maximum size allowed for a WebAssembly module. This value is not expected to be changed by flags.
